name: Odin's Adventures
summary:
If you like games with cool design, great music and interesting gameplay, then game "Odin's adventures" is what you are looking for.
Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of Odin, admire the beauty of the Swiss Alps, but do not forget about obstacles on your way.
Help Odin, experienced extreme rider, to conquer the mountain. Go around the rocks, accelerate on the slopes, jump over pits, but watch out for tire wear.
